abstract: Cuba grants six prominent dissidents one-time permission to travel overseas, weeks ahead of Pres Obama's historic visit.
snippet: Officials contacted half a dozen former prisoners, who were incarcerated during a 2003 crackdown on dissidents, and told them that they could make one trip abroad....
lead_paragraph: Officials contacted half a dozen former prisoners, who were incarcerated during a 2003 crackdown on dissidents, and told them that they could make one trip abroad.

headline.main: Cuba: Some Dissidents Will Be Allowed a Single Trip Overseas, an Activist Says
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Cuba: Some Dissidents Will Be Allowed a Single Trip Overseas, Activists Say
